thread.title: Beyoncé Slays With Theatrical Performance at Grammys
thread.title_full: Beyoncé Slays With Theatrical Performance at the Grammys | Complex

author: Shawn Setaro
title: Beyoncé Slays With Theatrical Performance at Grammys
text:
Beyoncé Slays With Theatrical Performance at the Grammys By Shawn Setaro Shawn is the host of The Cipher , a critically acclaimed hip-hop podcast that conducts in-depth interviews with the genre’s most interesting and important figures. He is a regular contributor at Forbes .
Shawn is also the former editor-in-chief of Rap Genius, and has written about music and culture for The Atlantic, Vibe, The Source, GQ, Esquire, The Sondheim Review, and more.
 Media via Vidme It would be near-impossible to have a more highly-anticipated performance than Beyoncé at the Grammys. Add in her recent pregnancy announcement , and excitement could hardly get any higher.
And somehow, Queen Bey managed to rise above even the most exalted expectations. She performed a medley of "Love Drought" and "Sandcastles" while wearing a suitably queen-like gold dress and headpiece. Surrounded by tons of dancers and crazy set pieces, she managed to make the performance seem simultaneously huge and intimate, even while being suspended dangerously in a chair.
Viewers were blown away not only by the theatrical performance, but by the fact that Bey did it all while visibly expecting.
Beyoncé performed at the Grammy's while pregnant y'all I can't even make myself a sandwich if I have period cramps
— Tor ( @Toe_Jamm ) February 13, 2017 I can die now. Thanks Beyoncé . # GRAMMYs
— Kelly B ( @kbnorthrup ) February 13, 2017 Guess I don’t need to see Lion King on broadway anymore after that @Beyonce performance
— CollinGriff ( @CollinGriff ) February 13, 2017 Related Beyoncé Is the Most Nominated Female Artist in Grammy History Beyoncé's “Daddy Lessons” Was Reportedly Rejected by the Grammys for a Country Nomination Beyoncé to Reportedly Perform at Grammy Awards Following Twins Announcement And there wasn't a celeb who viewed it—Bey's former groupmates included—who wasn't amazed.
🐝🐝🐝🐝🐝🐝🐝🐝🐝
— KELENDRIA ROWLAND ( @KELLYROWLAND ) February 13, 2017 I am crying. My bey . I cannot breathe
— christine teigen ( @chrissyteigen ) February 13, 2017 Beyonce is magic. A magical queen. Ye B! 🐝🐝🐝🐝🐝🐝🐝🐝❤
— Gabrielle Union (@itsgabrielleu) February 13, 2017 Who is responsible for Beyoncé's visuals at the Grammy's & when Lemonade dropped, I need them to do my funeral, I'm going out the right way.
— Chad Johnson ( @ochocinco ) February 13, 2017 Fun fact: I choreographed #Beyonce 's number. # grammys
— Larry King ( @kingsthings ) February 13, 2017 But out of the whole medley, it was the pop star's moment in the chair that got the most attention.
Almost had a heart attack! RT @mashable : "BEYONCE DON'T LEAN BACK IN YOUR CHAIR' - every teacher ever # GRAMMYs pic.twitter.com/ ixj6c0uX9Q
— Chip ( @Beanzz120 ) February 13, 2017 BEYONCÉ . HOVERED ABOVE GROUND. ON A CHAIR. THAT WAS ON A TABLE. I'M SHOOK
— Pu$$ay 🍣 (@shani_wani) February 13, 2017 A play by play reaction of me watching Beyoncé lean back in that chair with our children TBH pic.twitter.com/t8sicfh4E0
— Thug Misses 🇬🇭 (@QBreej) February 13, 2017 Find a man you can trust the way Beyoncé trusted this chair and gravity #GRAMMYs #beyonce pic.twitter.com/JmqPcMZmF4
— raissa (@Tbeauty29) February 13, 2017 Teachers at school: if you lean back in your chair you'll fall and split your head open
Beyonce: pic.twitter.com/jKrK8CZKbs
— Yasmin (@Thecurlymolloy) February 13, 2017 You can watch the whole performance, chair and all, above.
Tags: News , Videos , Beyoncé , Grammys
